channel.title: Podcast Industry on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 10 Essential Episodes of ‘WTF With Marc Maron’
item.description: Sure, the podcast trailblazer interviewed Obama — but there are plenty more highlights among the 1600+ episodes he’s logged over 16 years.

item.title: 10 Essential Episodes of ‘WTF With Marc Maron’
item.description: Sure, the podcast trailblazer interviewed Obama — but there are plenty more highlights among the 1600+ episodes he’s logged over 16 years.

item.title: Who the F*** Is Marc Maron Without Podcasting? He’s About to Find Out
item.description: Sixteen years after his show launched an industry and saved his career, the curmudgeonly conversationalist is feeling conflicted about what followed: “Things were better before everyone had a voice.”

item.title: Who the F*** Is Marc Maron Without Podcasting? He’s About to Find Out
item.description: Sixteen years after his show launched an industry and saved his career, the curmudgeonly conversationalist is feeling conflicted about what followed: “Things were better before everyone had a voice.”

item.title: Just For Laughs: Tig Notaro, Fortune Feimster, Mae Martin to Receive Best Podcast Award
item.description: The trio of comedians will be honored at the Montreal comedy festival’s awards show on Friday.

item.title: Just For Laughs: Tig Notaro, Fortune Feimster, Mae Martin to Receive Best Podcast Award
item.description: The trio of comedians will be honored at the Montreal comedy festival’s awards show on Friday.

item.title: Podcast Company Kaleidoscope Raises $5 Million For New Shows As It Eyes Film, TV Deals (Exclusive)
item.description: German publisher Hubert Burda Media and North Base Media led the Series A raise, joined by other media heavyweights like ex-Viacom CEO Tom Freston and The Raine Group.
